summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of that portion of the Henry Van Asselt Donation Claim lying between lines 1,377 feet and 1,594 feet south of and parallel to the north line of said Donation Claim and between the easterly line of the certain 60-foot strip of land conveyed to the Oregon and Washington R. R. Co., file No. 630365 and a line 250 feet east of and parallel thereto, and the south one-half of Lot 9, Block 15, Highland Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-222 and 17-165, respectively.
